page.title: 16MOBILE LIBRARY IN OGBOURNE
page.content: The{mobile library van}visits the Ogbourne area fortnightly on Tuesdays with 2500 books.Local people who have signed an application card have access to the County's entire information resources and may borrow unlimited books within reason.Neighbours may borrow for the housebound and there are no fines for overdue books,but few go over the time limit. The length of each of three stops depends on the number of readers served.Two stops have 10 minutes each and 25 minutes is allowed for the stop serving 60 at the Junior School and Liddiard's Green Estate.Here groups of 16 children at a time,aged 7-11,select books or cassettes to improve reading. Both adults and children prefer paper_ backs for their light weight.In the event of delay or cancellation a local reader is notified by telephone.
